Method that reads the arrays of solutions sent by the UTU and redraws the solved sketch using the new coordinates. Also displays the DR-Dag on a separate window

writeUTUFile

public static void writeUTUFile(int[] IntArray,
                                double[] DblArray,
                                SKShapeArray shapes,
                                SKGroupTreeNode groupRoot)
Writes all the data like coordinate of the shapes, their constraints and the groups in the sketch to two arrays viz., dataInt and dataDouble and sends them to UTU for further processing before solving.
